snippet: Do you know your business? Do you have resident knowledge of the ins and outs of the business that others don’t have? The answers to those questions are among the strongest indicators of future success.
abstract: Do you know your business? Do you have resident knowledge of the ins and outs of the business that others don’t have? The answers to those questions are among the strongest indicators of future success.

headline.main: What I Learned About Business as a South Georgia Bottom Fisher
